content: ईः ({%<ab>m.</ab>%}) <ab>N.</ab> of Kāmadeva, Cupid. {%--<ab>f.</ab>%} <ab>N.</ab> of Lakṣmī. {%--<ab>ind.</ab>%} An interjection of (1) dejection; (2) pain; (3) sorrow; (4) anger; (5) compassion; (6) perception or consciousness; (7) calling.

ई {vI.v} {c4c} <ab>A.</ab> (ईयते) To go. {vII.v} {c2c} <ab>P.</ab> {@--1@} To go. {@--2@} To shine. {@--3@} To pervade. {@--4@} To desire, wish. {@--5@} To throw. {@--6@} To eat. {@--7@} To beg (<ab>A.</ab>). {@--8@} To become pregnant.
